summary: Updated the collaboration page header and subheader text in all three language translation files (English, Turkmen, and Russian). Changed the header to 'Trusted carpet manufacturing for retailers, wholesalers, and partners.' and the subheader to 'With 24/7 Vandewiele production, in-house Neumag yarn, and ISO-certified processes, we provide the capacity, reliability, and modern design needed for international expansion and new store openings.' The image path was already updated to use .jpg format as requested by the user.
current_status: The collaboration page header and subheader have been updated in all language files. The header now emphasizes 'trusted' manufacturing and includes 'partners' in addition to retailers and wholesalers. The subheader provides more detail about the production capabilities and processes. The image path is correctly set to use the .jpg format. All changes are complete and ready for testing.
